input_args.passage: 'Church of St. Mary of the Spring (Istanbul) | The church is located in Istanbul, in the district of Zeytinburnu, in the neighbourhood of Balıklı, along Balıklı Sivrikapı Sokak. It lies a few hundred meters ...'
input_args.claim: "Additionally, source provides the local name of the church as Balıklı Meryem Ana Rum Ortodoks monasteries, also known as Monestry of Our Lady of Spring, and mentions its location in Istanbul's Zeytinburnu."
